div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 623 Br√Æncoveanu, c. 42 km. WNW of Bucharest, Rumania, 1967 Burial: early 1st cent. B.C. Contents: 93 AR. Pot hoard Alexander III: 2 late post. tetradr. (Odes- sus) Macedonia, 1st Region: 67 tetradr. incl. imit. Lysimachus: 1 post. tetradr. (Byzantium) Thasos: 16 spread-flan tetradr. incl. imit. Disposition: Bucharest (Inst. Arch.) 86 as listed Mitrea, SCIV 1969, p. 262
